<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_kasp_lossprevent_lp_questions">
    <x_kasp_lossprevent_lp_questions action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <fields>{
 "fields":[
{
         "field":"type_of_fraud"
     },
{
         "field":"date_time_of_incident"
     },

{
         "field":"location_of_incident"
     },

{
         "field":"camera_cctv"
     },

{
         "field":"rlpm_contacted"
     },

{
         "field":"customers_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"associates_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"witnesses_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"focus_store"
     },
{
         "field":"guard_on_duty"
     },

     
{
         "field":"reason",
         "options":{
             "show":["Cash","Check","Credit Card","Gift Card"],
             "hide":["Closing Shift","Left Store during operating hours","Opening Shift","Alarm Issue","Associate left store during operating hours","Door Issue","Forgot Personal Item","Front/Back Door Unsecured","Lost/Stolen Store Keys","Register Key(s) Missing","Safe Unsecured","Travelers Check","Weather Related","Mall Evacuation","Utility Issue(Water/Sewage/Power)","Illness","Family Emergency","No Call/No Show","Scheduling Error"]
     }
}
],

"sections":[

{
       "section":"incident_info",
            "fields":[
        {"field":"number_of_customers_in_store_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"number_of_associates_working_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"hop_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"preventative_action_s"},
        {"field":"incident_details"}
             ]
}
],

"level_of_priority":"High"
}
</fields>
        <question>type_of_issue:Fraud</question>
